thread.section_title: eDreams opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre eDreams | www.edreams.net
thread.title: Katya

author: Katya
title: Katya
text: Your customer service is the worst experience I've ever had in my life. I was on hold (with no indication as to whether I was on hold, no music, no noise, no tone) for two hours and never ended up reaching a human being. I sent a message to multiple email addresses and customer service forms and nothing. All I wanted to do was reserve a seat, but there was a topic removed from their FAQ called "How to reserve a seat" that still shows up in search but is blank when you go to the page. This is the worst.
